t: Razor Group acquires US Amazon aggregator Perch and announces Series D financing round
s: March 5, 2024 - BERLIN and BOSTON, March 5, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Razor Group ("Razor") has acquired Perch, the leading Amazon aggregator in the US, solidifying its position as the global leader in the aggregation of online marketplace consumer brands and creating the #1 player in the industry.
